RelatedSentence: The light sport aircraft manufacturer will consolidate manufacturing , sales , training and service in Vacaville , Calif .
ICON Aircraft reported on May 14 that it will relocate its global headquarters to Vacaville , Calif .

RelatedSentence: ICON Aircraft reported on May 14 that it will relocate its global headquarters to Vacaville , Calif .
Beginning in the first quarter of 2015 , the company will begin operating in a 140,000 - ft2/13,000m2 facility adjacent to the Vacaville airport , also known as the Nut Tree Airport .
